scripts.build-all: npm run build-uk && mv build uk && npm run build-en && mv uk build/
scripts.publish: npm run build-all && cd build && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update gh-pages' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:ttag-org/CRA-precompile-example.git gh-pages --force
